The post Bizzo Casino Review, Bonuses & Promo Codes 2024 appeared first on Cryptonews.

]]> Our Bizzo Casino review highlights plenty of attractive selling points – their large number of games, enticing bonuses and the number of payment options available.

Bizzo is a crypto casino that opened its doors to players in 2021. It’s quickly grown in popularity but how does it truly compare to other Bitcoin casinos?

What is Bizzo Casino?


Bizzo is an online casino for both casual fiat gamers and crypto gamblers. Though relatively new in the space, they’ve grown quite popular.

The casino is notable for its large number of excellent games (including live casino games). The overall design of the website and the UI of the games help to create an enjoyable and smooth experience. In total, more than 70 top-tier software providers are represented, although the casino does not offer any sports betting options at the moment.

TechSolutions Group, the company behind Bizzo Casino, has two different licenses: one from the government of Curacao and one from the Kahnawake Gaming Commission. This also helped establish the casino’s credibility.

Bizzo Casino Key Facts


The highlights of our Bizzo Casino review can be found in the table below.

Welcome bonus 150% up to €400 + 150 Free Spins
Bonus code None for the welcome bonus
CASH, SPIN, THU for other bonuses
Available game types slots, roulette, blackjack, poker, craps, bingo, Plinko, arcade games
Live games Yes
Available sports None
Live betting No
Payment methods
  • Bank cards (Visa, MasterCard)
  • Cryptocurrencies (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Tether, Ripple, Cardano)
  • eWallets (Skrill, Neteller, Luxon, eZeeWallet, AstroPay, Jeton, Sticpay, Perfect Money)
  • Google Pay, Apple Pay
  • Vouchers (Paysafecard, Cash2Code, Neosurf, Flexepin)
  • Bank transfers
Minimum deposit €10, but €20 to activate the welcome bonus

Visit Bizzo

Bizzo Casino Bonuses & Promos 


Bizzo Casino has multiple bonus deals offering both free spins and additional funds, but there are certain conditions that have to be met first. Let’s take a closer look.

Bizzo Casino Welcome Bonus Offers

Bizzo Casino welcome bonus is actually a package of benefits a new player can get because it includes both free spins and extra funds. The casino will match any initial deposit of up to €100 and provide 100 free spins for Dig Dig Digger or Mechanical Clover slots.

It’s worth noting that your free spins will be split into two batches – the first half arrives immediately, while the other comes 24 hours after the deposit is made.

To claim this bonus, you only need to create an account and make a deposit. However, the bonus does have a x40 wagering requirement, and the maximum bet is capped at €5 (this only applies if the bonus is active).

Existing Customer Promos

Existing players also have something to look forward to because every deposit made on a Monday will be accompanied by some free spins. 20 free spins are awarded for the minimum deposit (€20), 50 spins for a deposit of €50 or more, and 100 spins for a €100 deposit.

On Thursdays, players can get a reload bonus of 50% (up to €200) usable in Magic Cauldron – The Enchanted Brew.

Bizzo Casino’s welcome offer also extends to a bonus for a player’s second deposit. In this case, they will receive 50% of the funds deposited, up to €300, and 50 free spins, but only for Johnny Cash or Elvis Frog in Vegas. The same wagering conditions as for the welcome bonus apply.

Bizzo Casino Loyalty Program

The Bizzo Casino VIP program consists of 30 levels that players can scale the more they play on the casino’s website. The first five levels award an increasing number of free spins, whereas from level 6 this changes to cash prizes, starting with €5. Level 30 awards a whopping €150,000.

The idea is simple: for every €15 bet on any of the games, players receive one comp point. As the number of comp points grows, so will the player’s VIP level, which means better prizes.

The rewards won this way have to be turned over three times before they can be withdrawn.

Bizzo Casino Bonus Promo Codes


In order to activate Bizzo’s existing customer promos, you must input a specific code when making a deposit. If the conditions are met, the code will activate the bonus. However, there is no Bizzo Casino bonus code needed for the welcome bonus – this is triggered automatically.

Bizzo Casino bonus codes:

  • CASH – to activate the second deposit bonus
  • SPIN – for Monday free spins
  • THU – Thursday reload bonus

Bizzo Casino No Deposit Bonus Codes

Bizzo Casino doesn’t currently offer a no deposit bonus.

What Games Can You Play at Bizzo Casino?


There are more than 3000 Bizzo Casino games available, and pretty much all of them run extremely smoothly. 

Slots

Slots are this casino’s bread and butter as they form the majority of the games (about two-thirds of the titles are slots). In fact, this casino is right up there with the best Bitcoin slots sites. There are plenty of different types of slots to choose from, be that classic slots or jackpot slots, and a range of fun themes including adventure, horror, science fiction, etc.

It’s important to note that only slots contribute to meeting the turnover requirement for the bonuses players receive.

When it comes to some particular titles that caught our eye here, games like Wolf Gold by Pragmatic Play and Felix Gaming’s Book of Annuaki certainly deserve to be mentioned. Then there’s also Johnny Cash, Four Lucky Diamonds, the latter of which offers multiple play areas. After certain conditions are met, you can unlock additional reel sets – which provide more chances to win big.

Roulette

there are plenty of roulette titles at Bizzo to keep players happy. All the main types of roulette are represented, including American, European, French, and fun variations like Bonus roulette. Bizzo Casino partners with game developers that employ random number generators to come up with the outcome for every round. Therefore, players can rest assured every game is 100% fair.

Blackjack

Blackjack is another big group of Bizzo Casino games, and it covers all the most popular sub-genres: Classic, European, American, Atlantic City, and more. 

Some top-quality providers are represented in this category, from Pragmatic Play to Evolution Gaming and Playtech, so the quality of games is perfect. Great graphics and technical perfection create an excellent blackjack experience.

Some of the titles we recommend here are Blackjack Classic 1-72 and Lightning Blackjack by Evolution and Blackjack Lobby by Playtech, but there are many other options, so a little bit of digging will go a long way.

Poker

The only part of Bizzo Casino’s library we have some criticism of is its poker lobby. Sure, there are several different types of poker one can play here, such as Caribbean Stud, Texas Hold ‘Em, and Three Card Poker, but it is clear that the focus was on other types of games.

Live dealer

After slots, live dealer games are the best part of Bizzo Casino’s library. About 15 different developers such as Evolution Gaming and Pragmatic Play deliver more than 200 different titles, so the fans of this type of games can really enjoy themselves. Poker, blackjack, roulette, and baccarat are all covered, while game shows such as Deal or No Deal, Monopoly Live, Dream Catcher, and many others are available, too.

The dealers are very very professional and excel in ensuring you have a fun experience, never crossing the line but always doing their best to keep players engaged and happy. They are certainly one of the main reasons why this part of the website is so popular. The interfaces for each game – like Treasure Island, Crazy Pachinko and Lightning Roulette – we played were well-designed, which made for a fantastic overall experience.

Other games

Apart from all these games, there are a few other genres one can enjoy here. The most prominent example of that is Bizzo Casino’s fast games, which are sometimes referred to as arcade games by other casinos. These include the likes of Plinko, Minesweeper, Aviator, Limbo Cat and others.

There are also various dice and bingo games available.

Bizzo Casino Sports Betting


Bizzo Casino does not offer sports betting options at the time of writing this review. For alternative options, check out our guide to the best Bitcoin sports betting sites.

What Software Does Bizzo Casino Use?


There are over 70 game developers represented at Bizzo Casino, including Pragmatic Play, Evolution Gaming, Microgaming, and Betsoft – all represented by titles as popular as Buffalo King Megaways, Bonanza, Thunderstruck II and Gypsy Rose.

The games run perfectly and look fantastic. Players will be able to quickly immerse themselves in the experience – great graphics, beautiful visual effects, and the accompanying sound effects all combine for instant enjoyment. 

Bizzo Casino Deposits & Withdrawals


One of this casino’s greatest strengths is the amount of deposit and withdrawal options available. It is possible to use both fiat and cryptocurrencies, with the minimum deposit being set to €10 (although a new player has to deposit double that amount if they want to get the welcome bonus).

Bizzo Casino deposit options allow players to choose between using their bank cards (Visa or MasterCard), one of the numerous wallets such as AstroPay, Skrill, ecoPayz, eZeeWallets, etc., or a cryptocurrency (Bitcoin, Ethereum, Litecoin, Dogecoin, Tether, Ripple, Cardano). Even bank transfers are available!

The same goes for the withdrawal methods: the are are plenty to choose from, and the minimum requirement is once again €10, except for bank transfers (€35). However, there are daily, weekly, and monthly caps in this case (€4,000, €16,000, and €50,000, respectively). Bizzo Casino does not charge any fees, but this may not be the case with every payment method provider, so it may be wise to check that before initiating any transfers.

All requests are usually processed in a couple of hours, although the time it takes for the money to reach its final destination will depend on the payment method used. Still, the maximum waiting time is five days.

The casino also has account verification and KYC procedures in place to prevent money laundering. Completing these processes will allow players to fully utilize the speed with which the casino processes withdrawal requests. Otherwise, getting a request approved may take a while.

Payment method Min. deposit Min. withdrawal Withdrawal time
Bank cards  €10 €10 up to 72 hours
Cryptocurrencies  €10 €10 up to three hours
eWallets €10 €10 up to 72 hours
Google Pay, Apple Pay €10 €10 up to three hours
Vouchers €10 – –
Bank transfer €35 €35 up to five days

Bizzo Casino Interface & User Experience


Using this website is very easy and intuitive. The screen is never cluttered, but it’s never barren either – there’s always the right amount of items there to show the richness of the casino’s offer without it ever being overwhelming.

Finding the right game is also very simple because it is possible to search for a particular product using a search bar, but the games can also be filtered according to software providers or a particular type of game (slots, roulette, blackjack, etc.).

The customer service is also commendable, especially since one can reach the team via live chat. This makes getting any answer very quick and easy. If the live chat is not available, there is a contact form and the casino’s email address on the website. The reply usually comes the following day.

However, other Bizzo Casino reviews pointed out problems. Casanova.org noted that certain important information, like terms and conditions or bonus conditions, is hard to find, and Casino Guru found that certain sections of Bizzo’s terms and conditions seemed unfair to players.

We recommend familiarising yourself with every aspect of any casino site you visit, and Bizzo is no exception. We found their customer support team to be keen and knowledgeable, ensuring a safe and comfortable experience.

Does Bizzo Casino Have a Mobile App?


Bizzo Casino does not have a special app players can download and use to play the games that way but this is because there is absolutely no need for it.

The website works flawlessly on all mobile devices, so accessing it via a browser is smooth and effortless. In fact, the experience is just as good as on a desktop computer.

The only difference is that the main menu is at the bottom of the screen, not in a drop-down form in one of the upper corners.

Any player can access the website in a few taps and not lose absolutely anything when it comes to the gaming experience here.

Bizzo Casino Security


As mentioned at the start of our Bizzo casino review, this casino (owned by TechSolutions Group) has two different licenses: a Curacao Gaming Control Board license (number 8048/JAZ2017-067) and a Kahnawake Gaming Commission (number 00867). 

While the Curacao license is a standard in this industry, it is very commendable that the casino went ahead and acquired another license. This isn’t something seen very often, and it speaks volumes about the casino’s reliability that it was able to fulfill the criteria for multiple licenses.

Furthermore, this website has a valid SSL certificate, meaning all of the data on it is encrypted for maximum protection. All of the payment methods are reliable and work flawlessly and it’s possible to activate 2FA in a profile for an additional layer of security.

Pros

  • Two different licenses
  • Numerous payment methods
  • Second deposit bonus
  • Numerous games and top-tier providers
  • Minimum deposit requirement of €10

Cons

  • No sports betting
  • Only a few poker titles

The Verdict


As this Bizzo Casino review has shown, there are plenty of very good reasons why the website has managed to maintain and even grow its presence since 2021. It is a reliable, fun casino where every player can find something appealing.

Most of the games are slots, but there’s also a great live casino to enjoy. Games like craps, bingo, and blackjack wrap up the selection nicely, and it’s worth pointing out that the providers available are some of the best in the industry.

But the most impressive features are the number of available payment methods and the fact that the casino has not one but two licenses. These two factors combined show how much Bizzo Casino cares about its players’ security because all of the methods are perfectly reliable, and the licenses come from trusted and well-known sources.

In conclusion, this is exactly the kind of online casino a player should be on the lookout for if they’re looking for a place where they can simply relax and enjoy. It is a reliable, fun website with plenty of great games, an intuitive interface, and excellent support. In short, a casino we can wholeheartedly recommend.

Visit Bizzo

FAQs

Is Bizzo Casino legit?

Yes, Bizzo Casino is absolutely legit. It has two different gambling licenses, plenty of reliable payment methods, an SSL certificate, and the option for every player to turn on 2FA.

What games can you play at Bizzo Casino?

Bizzo Casino offers more than 3000 games, with slots being the most numerous category. There is also a fine selection of live games, bingo, craps, and roulette.

What is the Bizzo Casino welcome bonus?

The casino will match your first deposit 100% up to €100 and add 100 free spins for Dig Dig Digger or Mechanical Clover. Second deposits bring 50% up to €300 and 50 free spins.

]]> 10 Best Cold Wallets for 2024 – Safest Crypto Cold Storage Solutions https://cryptonews.com/guides/10-best-cold-wallets.htm Fri, 19 Jan 2024 11:30:00 +0000 https://cryptonews.com/?p=126852 Cold wallets, also known as hardware wallets, are one of the safest storage solutions for your cryptocurrencies. That’s because they store your wallet’s seed phrase offline while being encrypted. In other words, if a hacker compromises your computer, they won’t be able to see the seed phrase and steal your funds. What’s more, hardware wallets […]

The post 10 Best Cold Wallets for 2024 – Safest Crypto Cold Storage Solutions appeared first on Cryptonews.

]]> Cold wallets, also known as hardware wallets, are one of the safest storage solutions for your cryptocurrencies. That’s because they store your wallet’s seed phrase offline while being encrypted. In other words, if a hacker compromises your computer, they won’t be able to see the seed phrase and steal your funds.

What’s more, hardware wallets require that you authorize each transaction by pressing physical buttons. So unless someone holds your hardware wallet and knows your PIN number to unlock it, they can never transfer funds out of your cold wallet. Given that over $1.75 billion worth of crypto was stolen in hacks last year, having a cold storage wallet could have saved you from being in such a statistic.

To find the best cold wallets this year, we compared multiple options in terms of features and ease of use. Read more to find our top picks.

The Top 10 Cold Wallets Ranked 

In 2024, cold wallets remain the gold standard for cryptocurrency security, with top contenders like Ledger Nano S Plus and Trezor Safe 3 leading the market.

  1. Ledger Nano S Plus — The best crypto cold wallet that comes with over 5,500 coins and tokens supported, and a companion app that lets you buy coins with a card, transfer coins or stake them to earn passive income while enjoying the Ledger safety.
  2. Trezor Safe 3 — This is a popular cold storage wallet that aside from protecting your coins, you can obscure your crypto transactions or use Shamir Backup to restore your account.
  3. Ledger Stax — A premium cold wallet designed for NFT enthusiasts. It boasts Bluetooth connectivity and wireless charging, as well as a large E Ink touchscreen.
  4. Trezor Model T — Trezor’s premium model comes with an additional safety feature via a micro SD card slot that further protects access to your funds with an encrypted PIN. It also comes with LED touchscreen buttons.
  5. ELLIPAL Titan Cold Wallet — Leading crypto cold wallet designed with 100% protection via full metal cover, air-gapped and with self-destruct technology in case of device tampering.
  6. KeepKey — An affordable cold wallet with Thorchain exchange integration for seamless swapping of coins.
  7. Blockstream Jade — A Bitcoin-only wallet that comes with one of the lowest prices for a cold wallet. It supports multisig technology for approving transactions, a camera for scanning QR codes and more.
  8. SafePal S1 — Popular crypto wallet with air-gapped transaction signing, QR code scanning camera and over 10,000 supported coins.
  9. SecuX V20 — An excellent cold wallet with a color touchscreen, Bluetooth connectivity and over 10,000 supported coins and tokens.
  10. CoolWallet Pro — is a credit card-sized crypto wallet with a strong battery that lasts up to two weeks. It connects to your smartphone via encrypted Bluetooth where you can stake your coins or make transactions.

The Best Cold Crypto Wallets Reviewed

Let’s explore the most popular cold storage wallets that crypto investors are using right now to secure their altcoin holdings. 

1. Ledger Nano S Plus — Overall Best Cold Crypto Wallet, Supported By Live App

This is Ledger’s entry-level wallet. But don’t let this fool you. Ledger Nano S Plus offers the same functionality as the more expensive Ledger Nano X. The main difference between the two is that the Ledger Nano X has Bluetooth and it feels like it’s made with higher-quality materials.


The app that all Ledger devices use is called Ledger Live. This is both a mobile app and a desktop app. You can use it to buy coins with a credit card, swap them using decentralized exchanges like 1Inch and others, or stake your coins.

Ledger Nano S Plus supports over 5,500 coins, which is the same as the more expensive Nano X version, and you can also hold NFTs in your wallet.

Since it doesn’t support Bluetooth connectivity, you can connect your Ledger cold wallet via a USB-C cable with your smartphone or computer. This shouldn’t be a big deal if you mostly use your Ledger wallet for storing coins. If you plan to actively transfer coins or trade, the Ledger Nano X could be the better option due to its Bluetooth support.

Ledger’s support is top-notch. If something happens to your device, say it breaks or malfunctions, Ledger will send you a replacement free of charge. All this makes Ledger Nano S Plus the best cold wallet in 2024.

Pros

  • Ledger Live mobile and desktop app
  • Supports staking, swapping and buying with a card
  • Over 5,500 coins and tokens supported
  • Multiple accessories to customize your Ledger

Cons

  • No Bluetooth
  • No wallet seed phrase backup recovery yet
Visit Ledger

2. Trezor Safe 3 — Obscure Transactions & Restore Your Seed Phrase if Lost

Trezor Safe 3 is the best offering from Trezor because it offers the same functionality as the most expensive cold wallet but at an affordable price. Trezor Safe 3 comes with a monochromatic OLED screen where you can see the transaction information, and USB-C connectivity since it doesn’t have Bluetooth.

This shouldn’t be a dealbreaker, though, as cold wallets are designed for long-term storage and not active trading.

Some of the safety features of this Trezor cold wallet include the Secure Element (EAL6+) and the passphrase to unlock your device, which makes it hard for hackers to steal your assets. Another feature of Trezor cold wallets is the Shamir Backup, which splits your seed phrase into up to 16 pieces to help you recover your seed phrase if you lose it, meaning if you lose one piece or it gets stolen, you can still recover your assets.

As a companion to this Trezor cold wallet is the Trezor Suite app available on mobile, desktop and browser. Via the app, you can send, receive and trade over 8,000 cryptocurrencies

Unlike most cold wallets, Trezor has open-source software, which can be examined by anyone to ensure it’s safe. Another interesting feature is that you can go incognito with Coinjoin, which lumps multiple transactions into one, thus obscuring your transactions, and you can protect your identity with Tor.

Pros

  • Trezor Suite mobile, browser and desktop app
  • Supports sending, receiving and trading via the app
  • Affordable price

Cons

  • No Bluetooth
Visit Trezor

3. Ledger Stax — Store Over 5,000 Cryptocurrencies, Wireless Charging & Bluetooth Connectivity

Ledger Stax is one of the most innovative cold wallets you can find. It looks like a small ebook reader because of its curved E Ink touchscreen. Because of that, it is mostly designed for storing your NFT collections because you can put your favorite NFT on the screen like an ebook cover.

Aside from its interesting design, it supports wireless charging, Bluetooth connectivity and it’s highly customizable. This means you can connect your Stax with your Ledger Live mobile app and sign transactions without using cables.

As the name suggests, you can “stack” multiple Stax wallets one on top of the other, if you have multiple wallets. For example, one Stax could hold your Ethereum NFTs, a second one could store your Solana NFTs, and a third could store your coins.

Of course, one Stax is enough to hold all of the above. But if you want to have multiple Stax’s, say one for yourself, another for a family member, all with different screen images, you can easily do so.

Similar to the other two Ledgers, Stax uses the Ledger Live mobile and desktop app to swap coins, stake coins or buy them with a card. Also, the Ledger Live app is used to update your cold wallet’s firmware.

With all these features and functionality, Stax comes with an eye-watering price of around $279, which is on the higher end compared to other cold wallets. Despite that, if you are an NFT enthusiast and you can afford it, Stax is one of the best cold wallets you can get.

Pros

  • Ledger Live mobile and desktop app
  • Supports staking, swapping and buying with a card
  • Bluetooth and wireless charging
  • E Ink touchscreen

Cons

  • More expensive than other cold wallets
Visit Ledger

4. Trezor Model T — Color Touchscreen Buttons & Added Protection Via MicroSD Card Encrypted PIN

Trezor Model T is Trezor’s premium model that comes with a color LCD touchscreen instead of physical buttons and a micro SD card slot. The first is mostly a design feature, while the second is a premium protection feature. The way it works is, if you enable it, a randomly generated secret is stored on the SD card that you can insert into your Trezor Model T for extra protection.

Everything else is the same as with the other Trezor models. For example, you get access to a mobile, desktop and browser app called Trezor Suite. This comes with coin swapping and trading, as well as sending and receiving coins.

If you want to obscure some of your transactions, you can do so with Coinjoin, which, as the name suggests, “joins” multiple transactions into one to make it hard for outsiders to tell which transaction was yours. This feature is available to the other Trezor models as well.

Some of its safety features include the Secure Element (EAL6+) and the passphrase to unlock your device, which makes it hard for hackers to steal your assets. Another safety feature of Trezor cold wallets is the Shamir Backup. This splits your seed phrase into multiple pieces and even if one piece gets lost or is stolen, you can still recover your assets with the remaining pieces.

Pros

  • Trezor Suite mobile, browser and desktop app
  • Supports sending, receiving and trading via the app
  • LCD Touchscreen
  • Micro SD card protection

Cons

  • No Bluetooth

 

Visit Trezor

5. ELLIPAL Titan Cold Wallet — Fully Metal-Sealed With Auto-Self Destruct if Tampering is Detected 

ELLIPAL Titan Cold Wallet is one of the leading cold wallets due to its safety features and usability with an affordable price compared to similar cold wallets.

For starters, the Titan Cold Wallet is designed with 100% security in mind. It’s air-gapped, meaning there’s no Bluetooth, WiFi or cellular connection, and it uses anti-disassembly and anti-tamper technology that it “self-destructs” if it detects tampering. 

The wallet firmware is updated offline using micro SD cards, meaning you don’t need a US connection to update it. Also, you can activate two-factor authentication, PIN or password to unlock your device.

The wallet supports over 10,000 coins and NFTs without installing any apps as you need with other cold wallets.

Pros

  • Anti-tampering removes your information from the device
  • 10,000 coins and NFTs supported
  • Micro SD card protection

Cons

  • No Bluetooth or WiFi connection

6. KeepKey — Affordable Option With Native Thorchain Exchange Integration 

KeepKey is an affordable cold wallet with integrated Thorchain exchange for seamless swapping of coins and a Dapp Store where you can connect to decentralized applications like OpenSea to exchange NFTs, Uniswap, Etherscan and 1inch exchange.

To access the Dapp Store, you need to download the KeepKey desktop app. Via the app, you can manage your crypto portfolio by exchanging or transacting over 2,500 supported coins and NFTs.

To increase your wallet’s security, KeepKey supports a PIN number or two-factor authentication to access your device. This means even if someone steals your KeepKey wallet, they won’t be able to access it unless they can go through these two safety features.

Given the wallet costs around $79, there are no premium features like Bluetooth or wireless support. You’ll need to use a micro USB cable to connect to your computer to authorize transactions.

Pros

  • Affordable price
  • 2,500 coins and tokens supported
  • Desktop app

Cons

  • No Bluetooth or WiFi connection

7. Blockstream Jade — Bitcoin-Only Crypto Cold Wallet With Multisig Technology

Blockstream Jade is a Bitcoin-only cold wallet that comes with several unique features, including a camera for scanning QR codes and multisig technology that requires multiple keys to send a transaction, which makes it even harder for hackers and scammers to steal your funds.

With multisig, there are two keys: the first key is held on your device, which is backed by your seed phrase, and the second key is held on the Blockstream Green servers, which are protected by two-factor authentication.

Blockstream Jade’s QR camera is another safety feature that allows you to scan QR codes and sign transactions without connecting to any other device like your computer or smartphone.

Despite that, this cold wallet also comes with Bluetooth and USB-C connectivity. To manage your crypto portfolio, there’s a wallet called Blockstream Green, which supports multisig security and Tor for privacy.

With all these features and a price of $64.99, this is a cold wallet worth considering especially if you only want to hold Bitcoin in your crypto portfolio.

Pros

  • Affordable price
  • Bluetooth
  • Camera for scanning QR codes
  • Multisig support

Cons

  • Doesn’t support altcoins

8. SafePal S1 — Over 10,000 Coins and Tokens Supported For Just $49.99 

SafePal S1 is one of the most affordable cold wallets you can get. It offers 100% air-gapped transaction signing, meaning there’s no Bluetooth, WiFi or USB connection.

It can store coins, tokens and NFTs of over 100 blockchains, including Bitcoin, Ethereum, Solana, Ripple, Binance and more. But to manage your portfolio, you need to download the SafePal app.

The SafePal app is designed to simplify your crypto and NFT management, meaning you can transfer and trade your crypto assets fast and easily. You can access decentralized applications or make cross-chain swaps and yield farms with DeFi and Binance Earn products.

Unlike most cold wallets that require some sort of connection to a computer or a smartphone to approve transactions, SafePal 1 uses QR scanning with its integrated camera to provide 100% air-gapped transactions.

Pros

  • Affordable price
  • 100% air-gapped
  • Camera for scanning QR codes
  • 10,000 coins, tokens and NFTs supported

Cons

  • No Bluetooth

9. SecuX V20  — Color Touchscreen, Bluetooth And Over 10,000 Coins Supported 

SecuX V20 is a solid crypto cold wallet that offers the same functionality as some of the leading cold wallets at a competitive price.

This cold wallet comes with a Bluetooth connection, meaning you can sign transactions wirelessly from your phone or computer. It also comes with an LCD touchscreen, making monitoring your portfolio easy as you don’t need access to your phone or computer to track token prices.

The device’s security is enhanced with a PIN unlock or a passphrase. Unless someone knows either of these, they won’t be able to access your cold wallet.

With SecuX web and desktop app, you can send and receive coins and manage your crypto portfolio. With the SecuX mobile apps for iOS and Android, you can update your device’s firmware. 

Pros

  • Bluetooth
  • LCD touchscreen
  • Over 10,000 coins and tokens supported

Cons

  • App isn’t as user-friendly as competitor apps

10. CoolWallet Pro  — Credit-Card-Sized Cold Wallet With Integrated Staking

CoolWallet Pro is a cold storage crypto wallet that looks like a credit card. Despite the minimal size, it can connect to your mobile app via Bluetooth where you can send, receive and even stake your coins.

The wallet supports Binance DEX, WalletConnect used for safe connection with decentralized and centralized exchanges as well as support for NFTs via OpenSea and Rarible.

On top of supporting over 12,000 coins, Cool Wallet Pro supports staking for Polkadot, Tron and Cosmos. What’s more, you don’t need to have your wallet constantly connected to your phone. You can charge it and the battery will hold up to two weeks without charging, which is more compared to similar cold wallets.

Cool Wallet Pro’s mobile app is compatible with Android and iOS devices. But there’s no desktop or web app at the moment.

Pros

  • Bluetooth
  • Sleek design
  • Over 12,000 coins and tokens supported

Cons

  • No desktop companion app

What is a Cryptocurrency Cold Wallet?

A crypto cold storage wallet, also known as a hardware wallet, is a device with specifically designed hardware to encrypt and store your wallet’s seed phrase offline and in a safe environment. Hot wallets, on the other hand, store your seed phrase online. If a hacker has access to your computer, they can see your seed phrase and use it to steal your funds.

Cold wallets typically have physical buttons, or touchscreen buttons depending on the device, which are used for signing transactions on the blockchain. This makes it hard for scammers and hackers to steal your funds unless they physically hold the device. What’s more, each cold wallet is locked with a PIN number, a passphrase or 2FA. The fraudsters will also need to know that to unlock your wallet.


Using a companion app, these wallets can store crypto assets including cryptocurrencies and NFTs. You can also trade, swap, stake and more with these apps, giving cold wallets the same functionality as hot wallets but with added security.

What’s more, you can connect your cold wallet to a hot wallet like MetaMask or Phantom, which makes connecting to DeFi applications seamless. For every transaction you make, you will have to sign it with the buttons on your device.

Our Methodology  – How We Rated the Best Crypto Cold Storage

In order to present our list of the best crypto cold wallets, we developed a methodology that involved looking at several key features. The best cold storage wallet solutions are the ones that tick the most boxes on this list.

  • Security Features – Naturally, this was our highest priority. We checked that the wallets use strong encryption methods to protect your private keys, allow you to set a secure PIN or password to access the device and the information contained within, and have reliable backup and recovery options.
  • Supported Cryptocurrencies – Not all wallets support the same range of digital assets, so we wanted to make sure that the cold wallets we chose supported the widest range of cryptos possible. 
  • User-Friendly Interface – This list features wallets that as a whole, have intuitive and user-friendly interfaces, suitable for people who are new to the world of crypto, as well as long-time holders.
  • Transparency – Between open-source and closed-source wallets, we will always favor open-source wallets that let the community review and audit the code for security, enhancing transparency.
  • Community Reputation, Reviews, and Ratings – We researched and read reviews from other users, giving priority to wallets that had positive feedback and a solid reputation in crypto circles.
  • Manufacturer History and Reputation – We researched the manufacturer’s history to make sure that our top picks come from established and reputable companies. 
  • Security Audits – Our highest-ranked wallets have undergone third-party security audits, have multi-sig functionality, and can operate in an air-gapped (offline) environment, to reduce the risk of online attacks.
  • Price – Last but not least, we considered the cost of the wallet. Security is vital, but you don’t want to break the bank buying a wallet – otherwise, you’ll have nothing to store there. 

How do Cold Wallets Work?

All cold storage crypto wallets have a seed phrase, consisting of 12 or 24 words, which you can use to restore your wallet and access your crypto funds in case something happens to your computer or smartphone. That’s because your crypto wallet and assets are stored on the blockchain. Using the seed phrase you actually prove that you own the cold wallet crypto.

Cold Wallets Store Your Seed Phrase Offline

Cold wallets generate and store the user’s private keys on the physical device. This means the seed phrase is never exposed on your computer screen while you’re connected to the Internet. This way, hackers can never see your seed phrase via your computer even if your computer is compromised.

If the user needs to restore a private key, they enter the seed phrase directly on the device itself, which is encrypted and offline.

You Need to Press a Button to Sign Transactions

Aside from keeping your seed phrase safe, cold wallets have another safety feature. You have to physically press buttons on the cold wallet to authorize transactions. This way, no one can authorize the transaction except the person who holds the cold wallet device.

To increase security, cold wallets use a PIN number, a passphrase or 2FA to unlock the device. If someone manages to steal your hardware wallet, they would need to know your access codes to unlock it.

Why Is The Seed Phrase Important?

The crypto wallet seed phrase, often made of 12 to 24 randomly generated words, is the backup key to your wallet. This sequence of words is linked to the private keys and acts as a mnemonic representation to retrieve access to the assets within the wallet.

For example, you create a crypto wallet and you don’t save the seed phrase. If you need to reinstall your operating system, someone steals your computer or your cold wallet breaks and you don’t know your wallet’s seed phrase, you won’t be able to access your digital wallet and your funds will be trapped.

To protect your seed phrase, you need to write it down on a piece of paper and store it somewhere safe. The best bitcoin cold wallet makers, like Ledger, sell metal seed phrase protectors that can withstand fire and damage.

 

Advantages of Cold Crypto Wallets

The main advantage of a cold wallet is enhanced security. Since you need to physically press buttons on the wallet, you are safe from remote access hacks. 

Enhanced Security

The main advantage of cold crypto wallets is their superior protection against online vulnerabilities. Cold wallets aren’t connected to the internet, making them immune to cyber attacks.

This includes protection from hacking attempts, phishing schemes, malware infections and other malicious activities. By storing private keys offline, cold wallets ensure that access to your funds is protected. 

Unauthorized Access Protection

Cold wallets require that you physically press a button to sign a transaction. In the unfortunate event that a malicious actor has gained access to your computer accounts and companion cold wallet app, they can’t move your funds without you pressing the buttons.

This acts as a physical barrier against unauthorized access and theft, giving you peace of mind that your funds are protected even when you sleep.

Long-Term Safekeeping

Crypto cold wallets are designed for the long-term storing of your crypto assets. That’s because the safety feature of pressing buttons to authorize transactions can become a nuisance if you plan to use your cold wallet device for active trading. What’s more, active trading requires that you connect to multiple decentralized apps, which could potentially pose a threat if they’re hacked.

Unlike hot wallets, which are designed for frequent transactions and daily use, cold wallets are better suited for “hodling”, which is for keeping your assets safe long-term.

Immune to Platform Failures

Online platforms and exchanges are known to experience downtimes, glitches and even hacks. For example, DeFi exchange Curve Finance had various Ethereum pools hacked where $52 million were stolen.

CoinEx lost $54 million in a hack. If you had funds in these two platforms or any other where the assets were compromised, you could have lost all your funds.

Cold wallets eliminate this risk because you have full control over your assets and how they move.

Cold Wallets vs Hot Wallets

Both cold wallets and hot wallets are designed to store your digital assets like cryptocurrencies and NFTs. But there are some differences between the two.

Assets Safety

One of the main differences between cold wallets and hot wallets is safety. Hot wallets provide you with a seed phrase visible on your computer screen or smartphone when you open a new wallet. Cold wallets, on the other hand, provide you with a seed phrase directly on the screen of the hardware wallet, which isn’t connected to the internet.

This means that unless someone looks directly at your hardware wallet’s screen when you read and write the 12 to 24 words, there is no way that they can know your seed phrase to steal your funds.

Transaction Execution

Another difference between these two types of wallets is how transactions are executed. You can sign transactions with one click using hot wallets, which makes it an excellent choice for frequent trading or using decentralized apps.

Cold wallets, however, have buttons that you have to physically press to sign the transaction. What’s more, you need to unlock your crypto cold wallet device with a PIN, a passphrase or 2FA. This makes signing transactions more complex but also safer.

Use Cases

Due to being safer, the best cold wallets are designed for long-term safekeeping. This means that once you buy your crypto assets, you send them to your cold wallet and you leave them there until you decide to sell.

Hot wallets are designed to be exploited daily. Connect your hot wallets to decentralized exchanges, yield farming protocols or NFT marketplaces and feel free to continuously sign transactions. You can always move your profits into your cold wallets for safekeeping.

How to Choose a Cold Cryptocurrency Wallet

Choosing the best cold wallet is a decision that requires weighing in several factors, including security features, supported cryptocurrencies, mobile app experience as well as pricing.

Security Features

This is the main reason to get a cold wallet. But there are nuances that you have to consider as not all cold wallets are created equal. For example, some users prefer Bluetooth connectivity so they can easily sign transactions on their smartphones without using cables.

Other users may consider Bluetooth as a liability and prefer to have air-gapped devices, meaning they have no wireless contact of any kind that could compromise security.

Also, look for wallets that have a proven track record of security, like Ledger and Trezor, which employ strong encryption methods. Additionally, consider the wallet’s recovery options. In case the wallet is lost or damaged you will have to use your seed phrase to access your wallet.

But sometimes you could lose your seed phrase as well. Every Trezor cold wallet has a solution for this via something called Shamir Backup where you split your seed phrase into several pieces. If one piece is lost or stolen, you can still recover your wallet.

Ledger has recently employed a similar wallet recovery feature called Ledger Recover. This is a paid feature where you have to submit valid ID documents and a selfie recording. Once approved, your device will encrypt your seed phrase and split it into three fragments, which will be used to recover your seed phrase. Because your seed phrase is locked to your ID, you can be the only one who can request the recovery fragments.

What is Shamir Backup?

Shamir Backup is a security standard that aims to protect your seed phrase. The way it works is your seed phrase is split up into pieces, called recovery shares, and you can store them at various places. If one of the pieces is lost or damaged, you can still recover your assets.

Recovery shares are sequences of 20 or 33 words that carry part of the cryptographic secret. When you combine the number of shares you create a master seed, which you can use to recover your wallet.

Supported Coins

Most crypto cold wallets support the most popular coins like Bitcoin, Ethereum and Solana, but they also support thousands of other coins and tokens. However, some wallets, like Blockstream Jade, support only Bitcoin and no other coin.

That is why you have to consider what you really need before buying a cold wallet. If you only want to hold Bitcoin and sell it in 10 years, then Blockstream Jade could be a perfect wallet; it’s cheaper, it’s reliable and it’s safe. But if you want to store multiple coins and do multi-chain swaps, then Trezor or Ledger wallets are typically the way to go.

Companion Mobile App

Even though cold wallets are designed to be offline storage devices, most of them come with companion mobile apps that allow you to monitor your portfolio, to initiate transactions, to stake your idle coins, to use decentralized apps like Uniswap and 1inch exchange, and more.

That is why it’s important to consider cold storage wallets that meet your requirements. Ledger’s Ledger Live app is one of the best companion apps, where you can stake your idle coins. This feature isn’t available in most other cold wallet apps.

Another valuable app is the Trezor Suite, which has similar functionalities to Ledger Live, but it can also help obscure your transactions with Coinjoin.

Device Cost

Recently, it was revealed that Mark Cuban lost nearly $900,000 to crypto hackers by installing a fake MetaMask app. If this happened to him it could happen to everyone. That’s why it’s important to own a cold wallet and never share your seed phrase regardless of the device’s cost.

However, if two or more devices share a similar price point while offering the same functionality, you could spend the extra money investing in crypto. Compare the wallets you are willing to get and see whether paying a premium is worth it.

Limitations of Cold Wallets

While cold wallets offer security advantages, there are some limitations to consider. Before opting for a cold wallet, weigh the benefits against the potential inconveniences associated with cold storage.

Susceptible to physical attacks. Someone could steal your hardware wallet or it could be damaged or lost. If you don’t have your seed phrase ready, you won’t be able to recover your assets.

Regular transactions. Cold wallets are designed for storage, which makes them inconvenient for everyday transaction signing. That’s because you have to physically press a button every time you wish to make a transaction. If you’re making hundreds of transactions each day, it could be tedious to approve them every time on your hardware wallet.

Cost. While hot wallets are free to use, cold wallets come with a purchase price. Of course, this is a small price to pay for the safety of your crypto assets. But you still have to weigh in whether you really need a cold wallet or not for your intended use cases.

Conclusion

The 10 best cold wallets for 2024 stand out not only for their robust security features but also for their user-friendly companion apps, a wide range of coin support and innovative functionalities. Whether you’re a beginner in the crypto space or a seasoned investor, buying a cold wallet is probably one of the most prudent investments you can make.

Consider one of the three Ledger devices to hold your crypto assets. These are some of the best cold storage wallet solutions on the market, with strong safety features and a mobile app that lets you stake your coins or trade them whenever you want.

Ledger S Plus supports over 5,500 coins for an affordable price. But if you’re looking for Bluetooth connectivity, Ledger Nano X could be a better option.

Visit Ledger

Cold Wallet FAQs

What is a cold wallet in crypto?

A cold wallet is a hardware wallet that holds the seed phrase offline.

What is an example of a cold wallet?

Ledger Nano S Plus and Trezor Safe 3 are cold wallets.

Which is the best cold crypto wallet for crypto?

The best cold crypto wallets are Ledger Nano S Plus and Trezor Safe 3 because they offer top-notch security features with companion apps for an affordable price.

Are cold crypto wallets safe?

Yes, cold crypto wallets are safe as long as you keep your seed phrase offline.

Are cold wallets worth it?

Yes, cold wallets are worth it if you’re looking for safe storage for your crypto assets.

What happens if your cold storage wallet breaks?

If your cold storage wallet breaks, you can order a new one and import your seed phrase. Your crypto assets are on the blockchain and they aren’t lost.

What is the most secure crypto cold wallet?

Some of the most secure crypto cold wallets are all wallets from Ledger and Trezor.

Should I put my crypto in a cold wallet?

Yes. This is the safest way to store your cryptocurrencies. Also, never share your wallet seed phrase with anyone or keep it on your computer.

Does my crypto still grow in a cold wallet?

Yes, if you stake it. For example, Ledger Live, Ledger’s companion app lets you directly stake your coins from within the app, never leaving your wallet.

Is Coinbase wallet a cold wallet?

No, the Coinbase wallet is a hot wallet.

What is Bitcasino?

Bitcasino, also known as Bitcoin casino, was one of the world’s first fully licensed online crypto casinos when it launched in 2014.  Bitcasino allows you to play casino games from top game providers using cryptocurrencies.

The casino has a modern and user-friendly website design, featuring more than 3,000 casino games, and an affiliated sportsbook (branded as Sportsbet.io) where you can bet on all kinds of sports.

The post Bovada Casino Review, Bonuses & Promo Codes 2024 appeared first on Cryptonews.

]]> Founded in 2011, Bovada is an established online casino and sportsbook. It accepts players from around the world, including the US. But is Bovada the right gambling site for you?

This Bovada Casino review reveals everything you need to know. We discuss safety, payments, bonuses, promotions, customer support, available games, betting markets, and more.

What is Bovada Casino?

Bovada is an online gambling site that was launched in 2011. It’s based in Costa Rica, meaning it’s an offshore casino. This enables Bovada to accept players from the US, with the exception of Delaware, Maryland, Nevada, New Jersey, and New York. Bovada is also available in other countries.

Bovada offers a wide range of casino games. This includes table games like roulette, blackjack, and baccarat. There’s also an extensive selection of slots, video poker games, and live dealer tables. Bovada is also a popular sportsbook. It covers pre-match and in-play odds on dozens of sports, including football, tennis, basketball, and baseball.

Bovada also offers live poker rooms and a fully-fledged horse racing book. Our Bovada Casino review found that the platform is popular with bonus hunters. It offers several welcome packages across its main gambling products, plus occasional promotions for existing players.

In terms of payments, deposit methods include debit/credit cards from Visa and MasterCard. It’s also considered one of the best Bitcoin casinos, with various cryptocurrencies accepted. Although Bovada is based in Costa Rica, it’s authorized and regulated by the Governor of Curaçao. Its Curaçao e-gaming license is held by Bovada’s parent company, Harp Media B.V.

Visit Bovada Casino

Bovada Casino Key Facts

The table below highlights some key takeaways from our Bovada Casino review:

Welcome Bonus
  • 3 casino deposit bonuses, totaling $3,000 (USD) or $3,750 (crypto)
  • 50% sportsbook deposit bonus up to $250 (USD) or 75% up to $750 (crypto)
  • 100% poker deposit bonus up to $500 (USD)
Bovada Casino Bonus Code
  • Casino (USD): CAWELCOME100 (first deposit), BV2NDCWB (second and third deposits)
  • Casino (crypto): BTCCWB1250 (first deposit), BTC2NDCWB (second and third deposits)

Bovada Casino Bonuses & Promos

This section reveals each bonus and promotion currently available to Bovada players.

Bovada Casino Welcome Bonus Offers

Bovada offers welcome bonuses across its three main gambling categories; casino, sportsbook, and poker. Let’s break down each bonus type in more detail.

Casino Bonus

New players at Bovada will receive three casino deposit bonuses. However, the bonus amount depends on the deposit currency.

For example:

  • If you’re looking to deposit USD, you’ll get a 100% matched deposit bonus of up to $1,000. This can be claimed three times, valuing the bonus at $3,000.
  • If you deposit with cryptocurrencies like Bitcoin or Ethereum, you’ll get a larger welcome bonus. Each cryptocurrency deposit will be matched by 125% up to $1,250. This values the welcome bonus at $3,750.

Irrespective of whether you’re depositing USD or cryptocurrencies, you’ll need to enter a promo code. You’ll find these further down in this Bovada casino review.

Now for the important terms and conditions.

First and foremost, if you’re depositing USD, you’ll need to meet wagering requirements of 25x. This is based on the deposit and bonus amounts.

  • Suppose your first deposit is $500
  • Bovada matches it by 100%, so you’ll receive an extra $500
  • Your deposit and bonus amounts total $1,000
  • At 25x, this means you’ll need to wager at least $25,000 before you can withdraw the bonus funds

If you’re depositing cryptocurrencies, the wagering terms are slightly different. The first matched deposit comes with wagering requirements of 25x. Similar to the USD terms, this is based on the deposit and bonus amounts.

However, the second and third deposits need to be wagered at 50x.

  • Suppose your second cryptocurrency deposit is valued at $500
  • Bovada matches it by 125%, so you’ll receive an extra $625
  • Your deposit and bonus amounts total $1,125
  • At 50x, this means you’ll need to wager at least $56,250 before you can withdraw the bonus funds

So, while the cryptocurrency bonus is larger, the wagering requirements are less favorable. Another thing to note is that craps and live dealer games do not count toward the wagering target. What’s more, while slots contribute 100%, other games contribute less. Bovada doesn’t provide a bonus time limit within its terms and conditions.

Sportsbook Bonus

Bovada also offers a generous sportsbook bonus. Similar to the casino bonus, the amount you receive depends on the deposit currency.

  • If you’re depositing USD, you’ll get a 50% sportsbook bonus of up to $250.
  • If you’re depositing cryptocurrencies, you’ll get a 75% sportsbook bonus up to $750.

The key terms and conditions are similar across both bonuses. The wagering requirements are 5x when betting on sports or horse racing. However, this is based on the deposit and bonus amounts.

  • Suppose you deposit $200 into the Bovada sportsbook
  • You use USD, so Bovada matches it by 50%
  • This gets you an extra $100
  • Your sportsbook balance is now $300
  • At 5x, you’d need to wager $1,500 before you can make a withdrawal

The sportsbook wagering terms are a lot more favorable than the casino bonus. What’s more, the terms state that “You may use your bonus on any sport, wager type, and odds.” This means you can bet on sports markets with low odds, giving yourself a greater chance of meeting the wagering requirements.

Poker Bonus

Bovada also offers a welcome package for first-time poker players. Unlike the casino and sportsbook bonuses, only USD payments qualify for the bonus.

  • You’ll get a 100% matched deposit bonus of up to $500
  • You’ll need to download the Bovada poker software to activate the bonus
  • To convert the bonus funds to withdrawable cash, you’ll need to earn Reward Points
  • $5 is released for 150 Reward Points earned
  • You’ll earn Rewards Points every time you place a bet

There are no wagering requirements on released bonus funds.

Existing Customer Promos

Although Bovada offers generous welcome bonuses for new players, there’s a limited number of promotions for existing accounts.

This includes the Free Spin Bonanza bonus, which offers 500,000 weekly free spins. The maximum prize per player is just 20 free spins. However, there will be 25,000 winners every week. To enter, simply deposit at least $10. In the same week, you’ll also need to wager at least $20 on any casino game.

The only other bonus available to existing players is the Parlay Booster. Put simply, this gives you enhanced odds on selected parlay bets. You’ll also earn Reward Points, which get you access to the weekly Parlay Booster draw. However, the draw only allows you to earn additional Reward Points.

Bovada Casino Loyalty Program

Bovada offers a popular loyalty program that centers on Reward Points. You’ll earn Reward Points every time you place bets. However, the specific Reward Points earned per $1 depends on the gambling product. For example, you’ll get 40 Reward Points per $1 wagered on horse racing.

This increases to 60 Reward Points when betting on exotics and multiples. However, you’ll earn just 1 Reward Point when playing table games like roulette and blackjack. Slots are slightly better, with 3 Reward Points earned for every $1 wagered. You can also earn up to 15 Reward Points per $1 when playing live poker.

  • As you accumulate more Reward Points, you’ll move up the loyalty ladder.
  • There are six tiers, ranging from Starter to Hall of Fame. Some tiers have three levels.
  • As you increase your tier, you’ll get more USD for your Reward Points.
  • For example, the Starter tier requires 2,500 Reward Points for every $1 paid in cashback.
  • You’ll only need 1,000 to earn $1 when you reach the Hall of Fame tier.

Ultimately, if you’re a seasoned player who gambles regularly, it makes sense to join the Bovada VIP program.

Visit Bovada Casino

The Bovada welcome bonuses all require promo codes. You’ll need to enter them before claiming a bonus.

What Games Can You Play at Bovada Casino?

Now that we’ve covered bonuses, this part of our Bovada Casino review will explore what games are supported.

Slots

Bovada lists hundreds of slot games. The slots department is split between progressives, bonus buys, and ‘Hot Drop’ jackpots.

If you like playing slots with huge payouts, Bovada has plenty of options. This includes 10 Times Vegas, currently paying $82,000. There’s also Deluxe 777, which has a jackpot of $29,000. That said, the Shopping Spree slot game is currently offering the largest jackpot at over $2.16 million.

However, we found that the Bovada slots department could be improved. For a start, it doesn’t enable players to filter slot games by the software provider. This is a feature offered by most online casinos. In addition, there isn’t a search bar. This means you need to manually browse each slot to find your preferred title.

Roulette

Bovada offers just five software-based roulette variations. This includes American, European, and Zoom roulette.

Blackjack

Bovada offers 10 software-based blackjack games. This includes Classic, European, Single Deck, Double Deck, and Perfect Pairs.

Video Poker

We found 10 video poker games when reviewing Bovada. This includes popular versions like Jacks or Better, Joker Poker 10, Aces and Faces, and Deuces Wild.

Live Dealers

Bovada also offers dozens of live casino tables. This enables you to play popular table games with human dealers. This includes 34 blackjack tables. Casual players can play from just $5 per hand. High rollers will find maximum table limits of $50,000 per hand.

There are also five roulette tables, covering both the American and European versions. We’d suggest opting for the European version, as the house edge is lower. In addition, Bovada offers two Baccarat tables and two Super 6 games.

Other Games

Other Bovada casino games include:

  • Craps
  • Specialty Games
  • Scratchcards
  • Keno
  • Bingo

Bovada Sports Betting

Bovada offers one of the best sportsbooks in the market. Read on to find out why.

Available Sports

The Bovada sportsbook covers over 30 sports. This includes the most popular US sports, such as baseball, football, and basketball.

You’ll also find betting markets for soccer, tennis, cricket, and MMA. Less popular sports are also available, such as chess, badminton, and darts.

We found that Bovada also offers esports betting markets. Supported games include Rainbow Six, Call of Duty, Valorant, and King of Glory.

Betting Markets

Bovada offers dozens of betting markets for each sporting event. For instance, there are 57 different available betting options on the upcoming Houston Texans vs Baltimore Ravens game.

This includes multiple spreads, totals, and the win-win market. You can also place half-time and quarterly bets, not to mention margins and point ranges.

What’s more, most sporting events are available pre-match and in-play. This ensures you can still place bets while your chosen game is being played.

Horse Racing

Bovada also offers a fully-fledged horse racing book. Not only does this cover all US-based tracks but overseas markets too. This includes races in the UK, Ireland, and Australia. bets include the win, place, and show. Multiples are also supported.

Bovada Odds 

Bovada offers some of the most competitive odds in the market – especially on major US sporting franchises like the NBA, MLB, and NFL. However, less popular sporting events like chess and badminton can be less competitive.

Bovada Poker 

Bovada is also a popular option for online poker players. Consider downloading the Bovada poker suite for desktops. This offers the best gaming experience. The desktop software is available for Windows and Mac. Bovada also offers a native mobile app for iOS and Android. This can only be used to play poker and not casino games or sports betting.

We found that Bovada supports the three most popular poker models:

  • Cash Tables
  • Tournaments
  • Sit-and-Go

Each poker model comes with various minimum buy-ins, ensuring that players of all budgets are catered for. Bovada also offers anonymous poker tables. This allows players to hide their poker history from others.

What Software Does Bovada Casino Use?

We found that most Bovada casino games are supplied by Rival Gaming. Launched in 2005, Rival Gaming provides casino games to gambling sites from around the world. This includes table games like roulette and blackjack, video poker, and slots.

Bovada Casino Deposits & Withdrawals

Understanding how payments work is crucial before signing up with Bovada. Not only in terms of deposit and withdrawal methods but limits and payout speeds.

Let’s start with the deposit process.

Bovada Casino Deposit Options

The most popular deposit method accepted by Bovada is debit/credit cards. Visa and MasterCard are supported but not American Express or Discover. The minimum and maximum deposit amounts when using debit/credit cards are $20 and $1,500, respectively.

You can also make a direct bank transfer in USD. The minimum is just $50. However, bank transfers are capped at $450. If you want higher limits, Bovada also accepts some of the best cryptocurrencies to buy. This includes Bitcoin, Bitcoin Cash, Ethereum, Litecoin, and Tether. The maximum deposit limit on these cryptocurrencies is $5,000.

In terms of deposit speeds, debit/credit cards are usually processed instantly. Cryptocurrency deposits take up to 15 minutes to appear. Bank wires can take several days.

Our Bovada Casino review found that deposit fees can also apply. Although the first deposit/credit card payment is free, you’ll be charged at least 15.9%. In contrast, Bovada doesn’t charge deposit fees when funding the account with cryptocurrencies. This further strengthens Bovada’s position as one of the best altcoin casino sites.

Bovada Casino Withdrawal Options

Not all deposit methods can be used to make withdrawals from Bovada. For example, while you can deposit funds with a debit/credit card, you’ll need to withdraw funds to another payment type.

This includes bank wires, check by courier, and cryptocurrencies. Bovada also stipulates withdrawal terms, including minimums and maximums.

  • For example, the minimum bank wire withdrawal is $1,500. The maximum is $9,500 every 30 days. Bank wire withdrawals take 10-15 days on average.
  • Cryptocurrencies come with a minimum withdrawal of just $10. Although the maximum withdrawal is $9,500, you can make another withdrawal 15 minutes later.
  • The maximum weekly withdrawal limit for cryptocurrencies is $180,000 using Litecoin. This is reduced to $90,000 when withdrawing Bitcoin. Some cryptocurrencies are capped at just $2,500 per week.

What are Player Transfers on Bovada?

  • Another payment option available on Bovada is ‘Player Transfers’.
  • Put simply, you can withdraw your casino balance by transferring it to another player.
  • In turn, the player will transfer the same amount via your agreed payment method.
  • This option is only suitable when dealing with players you know. Otherwise, there’s the chance that you’ll be scammed.

Bovada payment limits and withdrawal times can be found in the table below:

Payment Method Min. Deposit Max. Deposit Min. Withdrawal Max. Withdrawal Withdrawal Time

Bovada Casino Interface & User Experience

In general, Bovada offers a great user experience. The sign-up process is fast and straightforward. Simply enter some personal information and contact details to process. Depositing funds is also seamless. We like that the Bovada website is split between the main gambling categories; Sports, Casimo, Live Dealer, Poker, and Horses.

After clicking on your preferred category, you’ll have access to a user-friendly dashboard with additional filters. For example, clicking on ‘Casino’ allows you to choose from slots, blackjack, and roulette. The sportsbook also offers a great user experience. You can find betting markets by choosing your preferred sport or franchise.

You can also click on the ‘Live’ button to see which sporting events are currently being played. That said, the drawback is that Bovada doesn’t offer a search box. This makes it slightly cumbersome to find specific games. For instance, you can’t search for a slot title.

Does Bovada Casino Have a Mobile App?

Bovada offers a native mobile app for iOS and Android. However, the app can only be used for playing poker. You can also play poker via desktop software for Windows and Mac.

If you want to play casino games or bet on sports, you can still use your cell phone. Simply visit the Bovada website from a mobile browser and log into your account. The user experience is still solid, as Bovada has optimized its website for smartphones.

Bovada Casino Security

Considered one of the best offshore casinos for US players, Bovada is an established gambling site that was founded in 2011. Although Bovada is based in Costa Rica, it’s regulated by the Governor of Curaçao. Licensing is secured by Bovada’s parent company, Harp Media B.V.

With over a decade in the online gambling space, Bovada has a solid reputation with players. That said, we found that some players complain about slow withdrawal times when using a bank wire. However, Bovada is clear about withdrawal times, which average 10-15 days. The solution is to withdraw cryptocurrencies, which takes between 1 and 24 hours.

Bovada also offers secure payments. Its website is secured by Secure Socket Layer (SSL) technology, meaning that your payment details are encrypted. Bovada also complies with anti-money laundering regulations. This means players must upload KYC verification documents before withdrawals are permitted.

It’s also worth visiting the /Bovada Reddit group, which is home to over 14,000 members. This will give you insight into Bovada Casino reviews from other players.

Bovada Casino Pros & Cons

To summarize this Bovada Casino review, we’ve displayed its pros and cons below:

Pros

  • Established in 2011 and regulated by the Governor of Curaçao
  • Supports slots, table games, video poker, and live dealers
  • Also offers sports betting, horse racing, and live poker
  • Cryptocurrency payouts are approved within 24 hours
  • Multiple welcome bonuses are offered to new players
  • Customer support via live chat, phone, or email
  • Accepts some of the best altcoins – including Ethereum and Litecoin

Cons

  • The mobile app only supports poker games
  • Bank wire withdrawals take up to 15 days
  • Debit/credit card deposit fees of at least 15.9%
  • Most games are supplied by one provider – Rival Gaming

The Verdict

In summary, Bovada is one of the best online casinos and sportsbooks for US players. Established in 2011, it offers everything from slots and table games to live dealers and video poker. Not to mention fully-fledged poker rooms.

Although some payment methods come with slow withdrawal times, cryptocurrency payouts are usually approved in under 24 hours. What’s more, new players can claim multiple welcome packages and minimum deposits start from just $5.

Visit Bovada Casino

FAQs

Is Bovada Casino trustworthy?

Yes, Bovada is considered a trustworthy casino site. Launched in 2011, Bovada is authorized and regulated by the Governor of Curaçao.

Does Bovada Casino pay out?

Yes, Bovada payouts are made via bank wires, cryptocurrencies, and check by courier. Withdrawal times vary depending on the chosen payment method.

What is the Bovada Casino welcome offer?

Bovada offers three matched deposit bonuses for first-time casino players. It also offers a matched deposit bonus in the sportsbook and poker departments.

What are the pros and cons of Bovada?

Bovada’s pros include an established and regulated platform, a wide range of gambling products, and top-notch customer support. The cons of Bovada include slow bank wire withdrawals and a mobile app that only supports poker games.
